name: Yashar Moradi
description:
Hello, I'm Yashar, a seasoned technology leader with over two decades of experience in software architecture, lean/agile coaching, and mentorship for high-performing product development teams. I'm passionate about developing data-driven solutions to help startups and established businesses achieve their technology and leadership goals in today's ever-evolving digital landscape.

As a fractional CTO and leadership mentor, I bring a unique blend of expertise to the table. I'm committed to empowering businesses of all sizes to reach their full potential and thrive in the digital world. With strategic technology advice, lean/agile coaching, and leadership mentoring, I help companies innovate and grow in meaningful ways.

Let's connect and chat about how I can help your business navigate the complexities of the digital world to achieve your goals. I'm excited to work with you and drive meaningful growth for your business.
